actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Travel Act of 1961 to authorize additional appropriations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the International Travel Act of 1961 to repeal provisions providing for an Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Tourism. Authorizes appropriations for the U.S. Travel Service for fiscal year 1981 and the succeeding fiscal years. Terminates the limitation on the number of employees in the District of Columbia office on September 30, 1980.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Travel Act of 1961 to authorize additional appropriations, and for other purposes.
